translations: 逗乐，逗笑；（提供）消遣，（使）娱乐

sentences.sentence: It amuses you and it doesn't hurt me.
sentences.translation: 它让你开心，又不会伤害我。

sentences.sentence: If it amuses you perhaps it won't do you any harm.
sentences.translation: 如果它使你感到有趣，也许并不会对你有什么害处。

sentences.sentence: "Well," cried the Marionette, angrily this time, "may I know, Mr. Parrot, what amuses you so?"
sentences.translation: “喂，”木偶这次生气地叫道，“鹦鹉先生，我能知道是什么让你这么开心吗？”
